column2: "Oh, it's you? That was tricky on Naberius before. Good job."
"It's just a rumour, but I heard ARKS are going to be holding some sort of battle competition soon."
"It's not just a test of strength, non-participants have something to do too. So much for a fun festival."
"Honestly, 気楽なものよね. Well, it's none of my business."
"So, when do you start? ...They haven't decided yet? Good grief, what terrible planning."
"Well, how about information for the people watching from the sidelines?"
"...Haven't they worked that out either? I'm shocked, they're heading for a disaster here."
"...What? I'm not interested. Like I said, it doesn't matter to me."
